content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you like the apartment. Let's focus on the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 500 Euros per month is a good starting point. It's a fair price for an apartment like this.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I disagree. 500 Euros is too low for this apartment. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, then how about 600 Euros? It's a reasonable price for an apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 600 Euros is a little better, but I am still hoping for more. I believe the value of this apartment is much higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: How about 650 Euros? It's a good price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 650 Euros is a step in the right direction, but I am still looking for more. I believe the value of this apartment is worth more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer 700 Euros. It's a fair price for a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 700 Euros is closer to what I am looking for, but I am still hoping for more. I believe the value of this apartment is worth more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can meet you at 750 Euros, but this is my final offer. It's a good price for a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 750 Euros is a good offer. After considering your final offer, I agree to the price of 780 Euros Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
